@MDTPro @aphenomenalwom1 I'm going to add a disclaimer re: permission to text into our @bosseduporg Bootcamp app right now! Great advice!
@MDTPro cool. There's nowhere to opt into text messages from Bossed Up as of now, but I like the idea!
@MDTPro that's a great idea, but y'all didn't opt-in to a text message from Bossed Up, so I wouldn't want to spam ya. Maybe to add to app...
@MDTPro ha! No worries, boss! <3
#ATL where you at?! https://t.co/8v5Wqj2Sa5
@lisabonos hey Lisa! thanks for the follow - I'd love to hang some time - adore your work! I'm on U st. :)

On behalf of white women who f***ed up this election - I apologize to Black & Latino women who stood up for all of us. #womensmarch
So we're in full Orwellian Ministry of Truth territory already, huh? #AlternativeFacts
@RSwirling but you're right - it's important to acknowledge people of color are policed differently.
@RSwirling fair point. protestor arrests say more about the police than anyone. Still, the volume of yesterday vs violence is astounding.
Record numbers marched, ZERO arrests made in DC yesterday. Just imagine if we put women in charge of more of our #democracy. #WomensMarch
Not cool! https://t.co/IuKuPBm6Pq

This is a week to get clear on what you want for your future. And how you'll fight for it, if necessary.

a quick #newyear reminder: self care isn't all spas & manicures. It can be tedious, too, but just as important! Schedule annual appnts now.
My mom's a labor & delivery nurse; ob-gyn caretakers hold a special place in my heart. Thrilled to work on assertive comms today! @acognews
I'm excited to be speaking on Assertive Comms today at the Junior Fellow Congressional Advisory Council meeting with @ACOG_AM @acognews
just left the theatre. @HiddenFigures is a masterpiece. go buy your ticket now. do it. it blew my mind.
new years resolution: spend more time with the boss bitches in my life! <3
@SaraLang thanks - no worries on the emails, I'll ping folk with this job descrip! thanks!
Loved chatting with @LeeCaraher of @everythngspeaks on this great podcast! <3 https://t.co/iP83DG8bGc
Back-to-work week 2pm survival plan: yesterday I took a nap. Today, I'm hopping on my bike for a half hour ride. My brain is useless at 2pm.
My New Year's resolutions in a nutshell: https://t.co/I9gOMckhIq https://t.co/ebPXMVRsCm
The new year is just the fresh start effect you need to âœ¨give yourself permissionâœ¨to start what you've been dreaming about. Seize it!
Welcome to the most useless week of the year. Take some time for yourself this week - get organized & refreshed for the Jan sprint ahead.
@iz_aries painfully cute
Be smart about when you sprint and when you recover.
Taking time off to enjoy friends, family, and fun this week doesn't mean you're not ambitious.

Are you ready to make 2017 the year you finally get Bossed Up?!
Apply NOW to join us at Bootcamp in Jan or Feb! https://t.co/uh3wjsAKbu
Make your networking list, and check it (email them) twice! Even if you can't meet for coffee until Jan, get their attn now. #careeradvice
If you're navigating a #careerchange, now is actually a great time to grow your #network. Not a lotta seasonal email = you'll stand out.
